description:
Are you NEW to Udemy? Possibly a new BUSINESS OWNER? Our maybe you are a professional marketer or BUSINESS OWNER looking for new innovative ideas. In our world with 7.2 Billion people. Annual revenue of over $216 Billion ONLINE in just 2013 in the US alone. Business are popping up everywhere. CLASSES are being made all time. There is more than enough for all of us so lets push MARKETING to the NEXT LEVEL. Lets create SUCCESSFUL businesses and achieve new heights using creative measures.

In this lesson you will learn:

  • Marketing:
    • Indirect
    • Direct
    • Facebook groups
    • Social media
    • Sales techniques
  • BitTorrent
    • What exactly is BitTorrent
    • Why people pirate
    • How to advertise in this market
    • Creative advertising through BitTorrents
    • And SO MUCH MORE!
This course will teach new business owners, marketing, and new instructors where to begin. I know the pressure that comes with creating courses. Here I go I spill out my heart create and amazing course WHERE DO I GO FROM HERE? This course will answer those questions and give you tips to ELEVATE your GAME! Enroll in this course today!
title: Using Creative Marketing to Grow Your Business.
